description: {"blocks":[{"key":"qqu8","text":"Mitochondria complex activity assays measure the activity levels of the different complexes of the mitochondrial electron transport chain (ETC).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_materials.name: MitoCheck® Complex I Activity Assay Kit

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fhuu1","text":"Isolate mitochondria from HEK cells, iPSC-derived neurons, or midbrain organoids using the Qproteome Mitochondrial isolation kit  (QIAGEN, Cat. No. / ID: 37612) according to manufacturer's instructions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9atao","text":"Measure Complex I (NADH oxidase/coenzyme Q reductase) using the MitoCheck Complex I Activity Assay kit (Cayman Chemical, cat# 700930). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65v2h","text":"Determine the rate of NADH oxidation, which is proportional to CI activity, by a decrease in absorbance at 340 nm over   in the presence of ubiquinone and potassium cyanide to inhibit complex IV and prevent oxidation of ubiquinone. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":119,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"auctv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f727e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"9EA14F10C4C011EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cphcr","text":"To assess CI, CII, and CIV function, we used a respirometry approach based on XFp Extracellular Flux Analysis and then proceed with steps 4-9.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e08d3","text":"To this end, resuspend   of purified fresh mitochondria in   of MAS buffer (  sucrose,   mannitol,   KH2PO4,   MgCl2,   EGTA,   HEPES  )  and seed in XFpSeahorse microplates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":103,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":106,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":115,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":87,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":99,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":109,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":118,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":126,"length":1},{"key":8,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"BF798310C4C011EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"CBC20B10C4C011EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"70","error_concentration":false,"guid":"5A253200C4C211EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"220","error_concentration":false,"guid":"60AEC780C4C211EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"6684EB80C4C211EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"5":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"755A8700C4C211EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"6":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"51025400C4C211EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"7":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"4ABF8B80C4C211EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"8":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"45576B90C4C211EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"number":"7.4"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29fte","text":"Calculate Complex I-, II-, and IV-dependent respiration by subtracting OCR values from the substrates (Pyruvate + malate + ADP for CI, Succinate + rotenone for CII and TMPD + ascorbic acid for CIV) subtracted from the ones from the inhibitors (rotenone for CI, antimycin A + rotenone for CII and azide for CIV). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"933c6","text":"Measure the OCR before and after the serial addition of pyruvate + malate (  each) + ADP 3,5 mM or 1 mM Succinate +   rotenone,   rotenone +   antimycin A, 0,5 mM TMPD (N,N,N′,N′-tetramethyl-p-phenylenediamine dihydrochloride, Santa Cruz Biotechnology) +   ascorbic acid, and   azide. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":116,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":128,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":141,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":255,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":276,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"007DF3A0C4C111EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"0DB59690C4C111EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"26E6B720C4C111EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"8","error_concentration":false,"guid":"2DAE4000C4C111EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"35E49B20C4C111EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"5":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"3B5F0A90C4C111EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crrq5","text":"Following each injection, record three measurements for a total period of   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"8262D200C4C111EDBCECFD719886ADAF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
